short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate random passwords with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Right click on the password fields to generate the passwords. Or, use the toolbar button to launch the extension's popup.

Generate secure, random passwords with a single click. This lightweight browser extension operates fully offline, ensuring your privacy by not tracking or storing any data. Perfect for creating strong passwords quickly and easily!

Configure to include alphabets, numbers and/or special characters.
